comments.text: We're using rounding the scroll positions for scrolled frames to pixel level values, which means that we sometimes fail to scroll to the edge.  See bug 542677 for a detailed analysis, as well as testcases which show the problem.
comments.raw_text: We're using rounding the scroll positions for scrolled frames to pixel level values, which means that we sometimes fail to scroll to the edge.  See bug 542677 for a detailed analysis, as well as testcases which show the problem.
